related_questions.question: They are watching tv now and they??a.will watchb.wathcc.going to watchd.are whatced

38. A part of songs which tells the story is called..    A. Chorus
B. Pre-chorus
C. Verse
D. Coda

39. A part of songs which is also called as tail is.. 
A. Chorus
B. Pre-chorus
C. Verse
D. Coda

40.A part songs which usually repeated in a song is... 
A. Chorus
B. Pre-chorus
C. Verse
D. Coda



Bantu jawab​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

38.C. Verse

Penjelasan=A verse is a repeated section of a song that typically features a new set of lyrics on each repetition. ... And while choruses typically contain a song's signature musical motif, the music of a verse is often written to complement the chorus music.

39.D. Coda

penjelasan=Coda is an Italian word for "tail," it is the additional lines of a song which brings it to a close. The coda is an optional addition to a song.

40.A. Chorus

penjelasan=When a distinction is made, the chorus is the part that contains the hook or the "main idea" of a song's lyrics and music, and there is rarely variation from one repetition of the chorus to the next
